ya1.2.2:0.2_0: those who are diligent in the training.
ya1.2.2:0.3_0: he reconciles it with the thought.
ya1.2.2:1.1_0: Whatever skillful qualities do all around are skillful ...
ya1.2.2:2.1_0: three skillful qualities, and the rest are not lost in the skillful.
ya1.2.2:2.1_7: skillful is a condition for feeling ...
ya1.2.2:3.1_2: Whatever qualities do not occur to you:
ya1.2.2:3.1_8: based on the support of the body,
ya1.2.2:4.2_0: the sway of rebirth and continued existence,
ya1.2.2:5.1_0: The section of recitation on the monastic code is finished.
ya1.2.2:6.1_0: The Book of the roots is finished.
